features.title: Bookmark in one click
features.description: Organize your bookmarks however you like. Our simple drag-and-drop interface gives you complete control over how you manage your favourite sites.

features.title: Intelligent search
features.description: Our powerful search feature will help you find saved sites in no time at all. No need to trawl through all of your bookmarks.

features.title: Share your bookmarks
features.description: Easily share your bookmarks and collections with others. Create a shareable link that you can send at the click of a button.
